info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 07 at 8:17PM CDT until August 09 at 10:51AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.2 feet, State Highway J just east of County Road 206 begins to flood near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 19.8 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The river rose above flood stage on Thursday, August 4. It crested near 20.7 feet around midnight Saturday night and has slowly fallen since. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday morning and continue falling through the week. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Kaskaskia River Vandalia 18.0 19.8 11.8 8.0 7.0 6.8 6.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
